thread.title: BRIEF-Imperial Oil Resources, Exxonmobil Canada Initiated Process For Monetization Of Horn River Assets

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Imperial Oil Resources, Exxonmobil Canada Initiated Process For Monetization Of Horn River Assets

organizations.name: exxonmobil canada initiated process for monetization of horn river

text:
April 17 (Reuters) - Exxon Mobil Corp:
* IMPERIAL OIL RESOURCES, EXXONMOBIL CANADA INITIATED PROCESS FOR MONETIZATION OF HORN RIVER ASSETS
* EXXONMOBIL - SUBSTANTIAL ACREAGE POSITION OF 228,000 NET ACRES IS AVAILABLE, INCLUDING 8 WELL PRODUCTION PILOT & OWNERSHIP IN PIPELINES, ROADS, FACILITIES
* EXXONMOBIL - INITIATED PROCESS FOR MONETIZATION OF HORN RIVER ASSETS CONSISTING OF OPERATED & NON-OPERATED PROPERTIES IN CANADA
* EXXONMOBIL - PROPOSALS FOR HORN RIVER ASSETS DUE MAY 31, 2018 Source text: ( bit.ly/2Ht1Jfc ) Further company coverage:
